# Lowe’s

June 2020 – Current (5 years)

Lowe's is a Fortune 50 home improvement retailer serving millions of customers across North America. The company leverages technology to drive innovation, streamline operations, and deliver seamless digital experiences for its customers and associates.

## Lead Software Engineer

February 2022 – Current

- Serve as product & project manager — strategizing, planning, and leading a cross-disciplinary team to deliver product and customer service excellence, business objective compliance, and leadership reporting
- Build and maintain an enterprise design system (React component library, docs, plugins), increasing efficiency and enforcing brand and UI/UX standards compliance across 250+ apps
- Create and deliver several key initiatives by developing partnerships across organizations and disciplines

## Senior Software Engineer

June 2021 – February 2022

- Established and implemented an org-level micro-frontend architecture to enhance long-term scalability and improve developer onboarding, defect resolution time, and feature release cycles
- Built and maintained consumer-facing web applications processing $100K+ per month in revenue
- Ensured product stability and seamless releases by evolving and managing DevOps processes: CI/CD, vulnerability, defect and risk mitigation, production readiness & release strategizing, and on-call handling

## Software Engineer

June 2020 – June 2021

- Developed and guided the delivery of enterprise apps, increasing labor savings and ease of use
- Designed and documented processes to improve developer experience, efficiency, and accuracy
"}

structuredContent.resumeContent:
export const metadata = {
  title: "Experience | Lowe's",
  alternates: {
    canonical: '/experience/lowes',
  },
};

# Lowe’s

June 2020 – Current (5 years)

Lowe's is a Fortune 50 home improvement retailer serving millions of customers across North America. The company leverages technology to drive innovation, streamline operations, and deliver seamless digital experiences for its customers and associates.

## Lead Software Engineer

February 2022 – Current

- Serve as product & project manager — strategizing, planning, and leading a cross-disciplinary team to deliver product and customer service excellence, business objective compliance, and leadership reporting
- Build and maintain an enterprise design system (React component library, docs, plugins), increasing efficiency and enforcing brand and UI/UX standards compliance across 250+ apps
- Create and deliver several key initiatives by developing partnerships across organizations and disciplines

## Senior Software Engineer

June 2021 – February 2022

- Established and implemented an org-level micro-frontend architecture to enhance long-term scalability and improve developer onboarding, defect resolution time, and feature release cycles
- Built and maintained consumer-facing web applications processing $100K+ per month in revenue
- Ensured product stability and seamless releases by evolving and managing DevOps processes: CI/CD, vulnerability, defect and risk mitigation, production readiness & release strategizing, and on-call handling

## Software Engineer

June 2020 – June 2021

- Developed and guided the delivery of enterprise apps, increasing labor savings and ease of use
- Designed and documented processes to improve developer experience, efficiency, and accuracy

parts.text:
I've been with **Lowe's** since June 2020 (5 years) and have progressed through three roles:

## Lead Software Engineer (February 2022 – Current)

In my current role, I wear multiple hats:
- **Product & Project Management** – I strategize, plan, and lead a cross-disciplinary team, focusing on product excellence, customer service, business objectives, and leadership reporting
- **Enterprise Design System** – I build and maintain a comprehensive design system including a React component library, documentation, and plugins that enforces brand and UI/UX standards across **250+ applications**
- **Cross-organizational Leadership** – I create and deliver key initiatives by building partnerships across different organizations and disciplines

## Senior Software Engineer (June 2021 – February 2022)

- **Architecture Leadership** – Established and implemented an org-level **micro-frontend architecture** to improve scalability, developer onboarding, defect resolution time, and feature release cycles
- **Revenue-generating Applications** – Built and maintained consumer-facing web apps processing **$100K+ per month** in revenue
- **DevOps Excellence** – Evolved and managed CI/CD pipelines, vulnerability management, defect and risk mitigation, production readiness, release strategies, and on-call support

## Software Engineer (June 2020 – June 2021)

- Developed and guided delivery of enterprise applications that increased labor savings and improved usability
- Designed and documented processes to enhance developer experience, efficiency, and accuracy

Throughout my time at Lowe's, I've focused on scalability, efficiency, and creating tools that serve both customers and internal teams across this Fortune 50 retailer.
